item.title: Why Projects Fail
item.description: <img src="/media/What_Happens_When_Brakes_Fail.jpg" alt="train crash" /> Regardless of your title or degree of experience, any misstep could result in a failed project. It’s a good habit to review the following two slide shows, if nothing else to provide a good confirmation that you are on the right track. Why Projects Fail: Obstacles and SolutionsView more documents from Michael Krigsman. Rome Death March Nov2009 View more documents from yourdon. Related articles Why Software Projects Fail (ribomation.
